author: uschindler
msg: LUCENE-2295: Added a LimitTokenCountAnalyzer / LimitTokenCountFilter to wrap any other Analyzer and provide the same functionality as MaxFieldLength provided on IndexWriter.  This patch also fixes a bug in the offset calculation in CharTokenizer (branch 3.x)
